entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person in the text. He is described as someone that Harry wanted to attack.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is mentioned as an animal in the text. It is described as a phoenix and its tail feather falls onto the table.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as a person in the text. He is described as someone who snatches up the parchment and gives it to George.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as a person in the text. He is described as someone who receives the letter from Sirius.

relationships.description: Sirius gives the parchment to George, which contains a message from Harry's mother.
Fawkes' tail feather falls onto the table.
